duties_responsibilities.duty: Work effectively with supervisors and peers on various water and sewer rehabilitation and repair projects.
Direct equipment with alignment, movement, and adjustment of machinery to conform to location needs.
Assist in initial setup and cleanup of job sites, including lifting, carrying, and pulling items 50+ lbs in weight.
Review entry and work permits; and assists in the review of pre and post-installation videos.
Enter manhole/confined space and perform job site setup and cleanup.
Haul equipment and crew members by driving various vehicles.
Complete driver’s daily record of duty and submit work orders for vehicle and equipment maintenance, as needed.
Continuously monitor for Safety hazards, and report any safety issues to the supervisor.

education_certification.credential: Safety Certifications for Confined Space, Competent Person, 10 and/or 30 hour OSHA, as well as those related to traffic control, as required.
